mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASKET ( B_NUM, B_ID, B_CODE, B_NAME, B_PRICE, B_COUNT, B_IMAGE, B_KIND ) VALUES ( B_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{b_id}, #{b_code}, #{b_name}, #{b_price}, #{b_count}, #{b_image}, #{b_kind}); )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BASKET WHERE B_ID = #{b_id} ORDER BY B_NUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BASKET SET B_COUNT = #{b_count} WHERE B_ID = #{b_id} AND B_CODE = #{b_code}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BASKET WHERE B_ID = #{b_id} AND B_CODE = #{b_code}
